name: Yasamin Sanjabi
review: the best dry cleaning I suggest it

name: Tanya Dravid
review: Best Drycleaning service same day service with no extra charge . We have been using this dry cleaner for a all year since we moved in the area. My husband for his suits , as well as my nice dresses and cashmere knitwear. I receive great service everytime, reasonable prices Staff is so polite specially Adam

name: Samrat Roy
review: Honest, reliable, follows directions, am a regular customer

name: Pinar Uzun
review: Excellent assistance from staff, machines easy to use, we only needed to dry our clothes and were ready in 30 minutes.

name: Ladislav Hornan
review: I have only good experience with this company over a period of several years. the Owner manager is polite and diligent in providing an excellent service.
